text.__SUMMARY__: Penicillium abidjanum is a fungus species of the genus Penicillium. Its teleomorph is Eupenicillium abidjanum
text.Further reading: R. a. Samson; J. I. Pitt; Samson A. Samson (31 October 2000). Integration of Modern Taxonomic Methods for Penicillium and Aspergillus Classification. Crc Pr Inc. ISBN 9058231593.
